INSERT INTO User_Transactions ( user_id, account_id, transaction_type, transaction_date, transaction_time, amount, description1, description2, description3, description4, asset_category ) VALUES
( #{tx.userId}, #{tx.accountId}, #{tx.transactionType}, #{tx.transactionDate}, IFNULL(#{tx.transactionTime, jdbcType=TIME}, '00:00:00'), #{tx.amount}, #{tx.description1}, #{tx.description2}, #{tx.description3}, #{tx.description4}, #{tx.assetCategory} )
